verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh now these תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <S%H8435><s%> tol-Dot Now these [are] the generations בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the sons נֹ֔חַ <S%H5146><s%> No-ach, of Noah שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8035><s%> shem Shem חָ֣ם <S%H2526><s%> cham Ham וָיָ֑פֶת <S%H3315><s%> va-Ya-fet; and Japheth וַיִּוָּלְד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> vai-yiv-val-Du born לָהֶ֛ם la-Hem בָּנִ֖ים <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nim and unto them were sons אַחַ֥ר <S%H310><s%> 'a-Char after הַמַּבּֽוּל׃ <S%H3999><s%> ham-mab-Bul. the flood

בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The sons יֶ֔פֶת <S%H3315><s%> Ye-fet, of Japheth גֹּ֣מֶר <S%H1586><s%> Go-mer Gomer וּמָג֔וֹג <S%H4031><s%> u-ma-Gog, and Magog וּמָדַ֖י <S%H4074><s%> u-ma-Dai and Madai וְיָוָ֣ן <S%H3120><s%> ve-ya-Van and Javan וְתֻבָ֑ל <S%H8422><s%> ve-tu-Val; and Tubal וּמֶ֖שֶׁךְ <S%H4902><s%> u-Me-shech and Meshech וְתִירָֽס׃ <S%H8494><s%> ve-ti-Ras. and Tiras

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons גֹּ֑מֶר <S%H1586><s%> Go-mer; of Gomer אַשְׁכֲּנַ֥ז <S%H813><s%> 'ash-ka-Naz Ashkenaz וְרִיפַ֖ת <S%H7384><s%> ve-ri-Fat and Riphath וְתֹגַרְמָֽה׃ <S%H8425><s%> ve-to-gar-Mah. and Togarmah

וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons יָוָ֖ן <S%H3120><s%> ya-Van of Javan אֱלִישָׁ֣ה <S%H473><s%> 'e-li-Shah Elishah וְתַרְשִׁ֑ישׁ <S%H8659><s%> ve-tar-Shish; and Tarshish כִּתִּ֖ים <S%H3794><s%> kit-Tim Kittim וְדֹדָנִֽים׃ <S%H1721><s%> ve-do-da-Nim. and Dodanim

מֵ֠אֵלֶּה <S%H428><s%> Me-'el-leh these נִפְרְד֞וּ <S%H6504><s%> nif-re-Du divided in אִיֵּ֤י <S%H339><s%> 'i-Yei By these were the isles הַגּוֹיִם֙ <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim of the Gentiles בְּאַרְצֹתָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-tzo-Tam, their lands אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one לִלְשֹׁנ֑וֹ <S%H3956><s%> lil-sho-No; after his tongue לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families בְּגוֹיֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> be-go-ye-Hem. in their nations

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons חָ֑ם <S%H2526><s%> Cham; of Ham כּ֥וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> kush Cush וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> u-mitz-Ra-yim and Mizraim וּפ֥וּט <S%H6316><s%> u-Fut and Phut וּכְנָֽעַן׃ <S%H3667><s%> u-che-Na-'an. and Canaan

וּבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the sons כ֔וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> Chush, of Cush סְבָא֙ <S%H5434><s%> se-Va Seba וַֽחֲוִילָ֔ה <S%H2341><s%> va-cha-vi-Lah, and Havilah וְסַבְתָּ֥ה <S%H5454><s%> ve-sav-Tah and Sabtah וְרַעְמָ֖ה <S%H7484><s%> ve-ra'-Mah and Raamah וְסַבְתְּכָ֑א <S%H5455><s%> ve-sav-te-Cha; and Sabtecha וּבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei and the sons רַעְמָ֖ה <S%H7484><s%> ra'-Mah of Raamah שְׁבָ֥א <S%H7614><s%> she-Va Sheba וּדְדָֽן׃ <S%H1719><s%> u-de-Dan. and Dedan

וְכ֖וּשׁ <S%H3568><s%> ve-Chush And Cush יָלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נִמְרֹ֑ד <S%H5248><s%> nim-Rod; Nimrod ה֣וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הֵחֵ֔ל <S%H2490><s%> he-Chel, he began לִֽהְי֥וֹת <S%H1961><s%> lih-Yot to be גִּבֹּ֖ר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor a mighty one בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz. in the earth

הֽוּא־ <S%H1931><s%> hu- he הָיָ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> ha-Yah become גִבֹּֽר־ <S%H1368><s%> gib-bor- He was a mighty צַ֖יִד <S%H6718><s%> Tza-yid hunter לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- and כֵּן֙ <S%H3651><s%> ken wherefore יֵֽאָמַ֔ר <S%H559><s%> ye-'a-Mar, it is said כְּנִמְרֹ֛ד <S%H5248><s%> ke-nim-Rod Even as Nimrod גִּבּ֥וֹר <S%H1368><s%> gib-Bor the mighty צַ֖יִד <S%H6718><s%> Tza-yid hunter לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei before יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַתְּהִ֨י <S%H1961><s%> vat-te-Hi become רֵאשִׁ֤ית <S%H7225><s%> re-Shit And the beginning מַמְלַכְתּוֹ֙ <S%H4467><s%> mam-lach-To of his kingdom בָּבֶ֔ל <S%H894><s%> ba-Vel, was Babel וְאֶ֖רֶךְ <S%H751><s%> ve-'E-rech and Erech וְאַכַּ֣ד <S%H390><s%> ve-'ak-Kad and Accad וְכַלְנֵ֑ה <S%H3641><s%> ve-chal-Neh; and Calneh בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> be-'E-retz in the land שִׁנְעָֽר׃ <S%H8152><s%> shin-'Ar. of Shinar

מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- that הָאָ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz Out of that land הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> ha-Hiv he יָצָ֣א <S%H3318><s%> ya-Tza went forth אַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur; Asshur וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven and builded אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- נִ֣ינְוֵ֔ה <S%H5210><s%> nin-Veh, Nineveh וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רְחֹבֹ֥ת <S%H7344><s%> re-cho-Vot Rehoboth עִ֖יר <S%H5892><s%> 'ir and the city וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּֽלַח׃ <S%H3625><s%> Ka-lach. and Calah

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et רֶ֔סֶן <S%H7449><s%> Re-sen, And Resen בֵּ֥ין <S%H996><s%> bein between נִֽינְוֵ֖ה <S%H5210><s%> nin-Veh between Nineveh וּבֵ֣ין <S%H996><s%> u-Vein between כָּ֑לַח <S%H3625><s%> Ka-lach; and Calah הִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> hi he הָעִ֥יר <S%H5892><s%> ha-'Ir city הַגְּדֹלָֽה׃ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ge-do-Lah. the same [is] a great

וּמִצְרַ֡יִם <S%H4714><s%> u-mitz-Ra-yim And Mizraim יָלַ֞ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- לוּדִ֧ים <S%H3866><s%> lu-Dim Ludim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֲנָמִ֛ים <S%H6047><s%> 'a-na-Mim and Anamim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et לְהָבִ֖ים <S%H3853><s%> le-ha-Vim and Lehabim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et נַפְתֻּחִֽים׃ <S%H5320><s%> naf-tu-Chim. and Naphtuhim

וְֽאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et פַּתְרֻסִ֞ים <S%H6625><s%> pat-ru-Sim And Pathrusim וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כַּסְלֻחִ֗ים <S%H3695><s%> kas-lu-Chim, and Casluhim אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which יָצְא֥וּ <S%H3318><s%> ya-tze-'U (out of whom came מִשָּׁ֛ם <S%H8033><s%> mish-Sham in it פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <S%H6430><s%> pe-lish-Tim Philistine וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כַּפְתֹּרִֽים׃ <S%H3732><s%> kaf-to-Rim. Caphthorim ס sa-Mek

וּכְנַ֗עַן <S%H3667><s%> u-che-Na-'an, And Canaan יָלַ֛ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- צִידֹ֥ן <S%H6721><s%> tzi-Don Sidon בְּכֹר֖וֹ <S%H1060><s%> be-cho-Ro his firstborn וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֵֽת׃ <S%H2845><s%> Chet. and Heth

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַיְבוּסִי֙ <S%H2983><s%> hay-vu-Si And the Jebusite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <S%H567><s%> ha-'e-mo-Ri, and the Amorite וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַגִּרְגָּשִֽׁי׃ <S%H1622><s%> hag-gir-ga-Shi. and the Girgasite

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַֽחִוִּ֥י <S%H2340><s%> ha-chiv-Vi And the Hivite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַֽעַרְקִ֖י <S%H6208><s%> ha-'ar-Ki and the Arkite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַסִּינִֽי׃ <S%H5513><s%> has-si-Ni. and the Sinite

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הָֽאַרְוָדִ֥י <S%H721><s%> ha-'ar-va-Di And the Arvadite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַצְּמָרִ֖י <S%H6786><s%> hatz-tze-ma-Ri and the Zemarite וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הַֽחֲמָתִ֑י <S%H2577><s%> ha-cha-ma-Ti; and the Hamathite וְאַחַ֣ר <S%H310><s%> ve-'a-Char and afterward נָפֹ֔צוּ <S%H6327><s%> na-Fo-tzu, spread abroad מִשְׁפְּח֖וֹת <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-Chot were the families הַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽי׃ <S%H3669><s%> Hak-ke-na-'a-Ni. of the Canaanites

וַֽיְהִ֞י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi extended גְּב֤וּל <S%H1366><s%> ge-Vul And the border הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <S%H3669><s%> hak-ke-na-'a-Ni of the Canaanites מִצִּידֹ֔ן <S%H6721><s%> mitz-tzi-Don, was from Sidon בֹּאֲכָ֥ה <S%H935><s%> bo-'a-Chah as thou comest גְרָ֖רָה <S%H1642><s%> ge-Ra-rah to Gerar עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far עַזָּ֑ה <S%H5804><s%> 'az-Zah; unto Gaza בֹּאֲכָ֞ה <S%H935><s%> bo-'a-Chah as thou goest סְדֹ֧מָה <S%H5467><s%> se-Do-mah unto Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֛ה <S%H6017><s%> va-'a-mo-Rah and Gomorrah וְאַדְמָ֥ה <S%H126><s%> ve-'ad-Mah and Admah וּצְבֹיִ֖ם <S%H6636><s%> u-tze-vo-Yim and Zeboim עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> 'ad- far לָֽשַׁע׃ <S%H3962><s%> La-sha'. even unto Lasha

אֵ֣לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These בְנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- These [are] the sons חָ֔ם <S%H2526><s%> Cham, of Ham לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לִלְשֹֽׁנֹתָ֑ם <S%H3956><s%> lil-sho-no-Tam; after their tongues בְּאַרְצֹתָ֖ם <S%H776><s%> be-'ar-tzo-Tam in their countries בְּגוֹיֵהֶֽם׃ <S%H1471><s%> be-go-ye-Hem. [and] in their nations ס sa-Mek

וּלְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8035><s%> ul-Shem Unto Shem יֻלַּ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> yul-Lad even to him were [children] born גַּם־ <S%H1571><s%> gam- Also ה֑וּא <S%H1931><s%> Hu; he אֲבִי֙ <S%H1><s%> 'a-Vi also the father כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of all the children עֵ֔בֶר <S%H5677><s%> 'E-ver, of Eber אֲחִ֖י <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chi the brother יֶ֥פֶת <S%H3315><s%> Ye-fet of Japheth הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol. the elder

בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei The children שֵׁ֖ם <S%H8035><s%> shem of Shem עֵילָ֣ם <S%H5867><s%> 'ei-Lam Elam וְאַשּׁ֑וּר <S%H804><s%> ve-'ash-Shur; and Asshur וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> ve-'ar-pach-Shad and Arphaxad וְל֥וּד <S%H3865><s%> ve-Lud and Lud וַֽאֲרָֽם׃ <S%H758><s%> Va-'a-Ram. and Aram

וּבְנֵ֖י <S%H1121><s%> u-ve-Nei And the children אֲרָ֑ם <S%H758><s%> 'a-Ram; of Aram ע֥וּץ <S%H5780><s%> 'utz Uz וְח֖וּל <S%H2343><s%> ve-Chul and Hul וְגֶ֥תֶר <S%H1666><s%> ve-Ge-ter and Gether וָמַֽשׁ׃ <S%H4851><s%> va-Mash. and Mash

וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <S%H775><s%> ve-'ar-pach-Shad And Arphaxad יָלַ֣ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׁ֑לַח <S%H7974><s%> Sha-lach; Salah וְשֶׁ֖לַח <S%H7974><s%> ve-She-lach and Salah יָלַ֥ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- עֵֽבֶר׃ <S%H5677><s%> 'E-ver. Eber

וּלְעֵ֥בֶר <S%H5677><s%> ul-'E-ver And unto Eber יֻלַּ֖ד <S%H3205><s%> yul-Lad were born שְׁנֵ֣י <S%H8147><s%> she-Nei two בָנִ֑ים <S%H1121><s%> va-Nim; sons שֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> shem the name הָֽאֶחָ֞ד <S%H259><s%> ha-'e-Chad of one פֶּ֗לֶג <S%H6389><s%> Pe-leg, [was] Peleg כִּ֤י <S%H3588><s%> ki in בְיָמָיו֙ <S%H3117><s%> ve-ya-Mav for in his days נִפְלְגָ֣ה <S%H6385><s%> nif-le-Gah divided הָאָ֔רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ha-'A-retz, was the earth וְשֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אָחִ֖יו <S%H251><s%> 'a-Chiv and his brother's יָקְטָֽן׃ <S%H3355><s%> ya-ke-Tan. [was] Joktan

וְיָקְטָ֣ן <S%H3355><s%> ve-ya-ke-Tan And Joktan יָלַ֔ד <S%H3205><s%> ya-Lad, begat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- אַלְמוֹדָ֖ד <S%H486><s%> al-mo-Dad Almodad וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שָׁ֑לֶף <S%H8026><s%> Sha-lef; and Sheleph וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et חֲצַרְמָ֖וֶת <S%H2700><s%> cha-tzar-Ma-vet and Hazarmaveth וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et יָֽרַח׃ <S%H3392><s%> Ya-rach. and Jerah

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et הֲדוֹרָ֥ם <S%H1913><s%> ha-do-Ram And Hadoram וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אוּזָ֖ל <S%H187><s%> 'u-Zal and Uzal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et דִּקְלָֽה׃ <S%H1853><s%> dik-Lah. and Diklah

וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עוֹבָ֥ל <S%H5745><s%> o-Val And Obal וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲבִֽימָאֵ֖ל <S%H39><s%> 'a-vi-ma-'El and Abimael וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שְׁבָֽא׃ <S%H7614><s%> she-Va. and Sheba
